casebody.data:
Sergeant Roger MALONE, a Member of the New Jersey State Police (Badge No. 5181), Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
STATE of New Jersey, Division of State Police of the State of New Jersey, Division of Law and Public Safety, Sergeant Ferroni and Acting Major Heitmann, Defendants-Respondents,
and
Major Robert Catullo (Ret.), Major Michael Mattia (Ret.), Major Fowler (Ret.) and Captain Brooklyn Smith, Defendants. C-993 September Term 2016
079369 Supreme Court of New Jersey. July 20, 2017

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-005755-14 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
